msbt.message: Aaah! I JUST remembered there's something I gotta do!I really should get to it! Let's talk later, !
Oh! How long you been standing there? Yikes, sorry I was so spaced out, .Got so much on my mind that I got no time to talk. Let's catch up later!
Oops, you caught me at a bad time. I'm about to be busy with something.We can definitely hang out later, though, !
